name: Responsibility Zero
description:
- Over 100 ways to give your trouble to others.
- Over 20 secret levels and easter eggs.
- Play as over 10 different characters: memer, elephant, robot and more.
- With some really weird sound. Turn on audio for more fun.
- Game is created by very responsible developers ʘ‿ʘ You won't want to spend a single penny in this game.

P.S. “The price of greatness is responsibility.”
